Body:
I want to use AWS IoT Rule Engine to republish a totally irrelevant message to another topic when the input met a certain condition. How can I do this?

SELECT * FROM topic/input WHERE value > 5

If I get a payload

{	    value": 8	}

I want to republish a message to topic/output

{	    "Msg": "We got fire"	}

Input and Output payload are totally irrelevant.

"
or I have to use AWS Lambda? The funcitonality is quite simple, any possibility to avoid?
